title: Shark Fin Nami Skin
body: Hi Riot i was wondering if you could make a shark fin Nami skin. The skins I have seen don't really appeal to me they are nice but I would love to see something alittle more aggressive I guess would be the best way to put it lol. Thanks for reading and I hope you consider my idea for the skin.

replies.body: I was thinking more along the lines of the old cartoon Street sharks idk how to upload a picture sorry
